title: Core Meta-Reasoning Infrastructure

tasks.description: Create src/types/modes/metareasoning.ts - Define MetaReasoningThought type with strategy monitoring, evaluation, recommendations, quality metrics, and session context
Update src/types/core.ts - Add METAREASONING to ThinkingMode enum
Update src/types/core.ts - Add MetaReasoningThought to Thought union type
Update src/types/core.ts - Add type guard isMetaReasoningThought()
Update src/types/core.ts - Add METAREASONING to FULLY_IMPLEMENTED_MODES list
Create src/validation/validators/modes/metareasoning.ts - Validator for meta-reasoning with strategy evaluation, recommendation validation, quality metrics checks
Update src/validation/schemas.ts - Add MetaReasoningSchema using Zod
Update src/tools/json-schemas.ts - Add metareasoning to deepthinking_analytical_schema (or create deepthinking_meta_schema)
Update src/tools/definitions.ts - Route metareasoning mode appropriately
Update src/services/ModeRouter.ts - Add metareasoning routing logic
Create src/modes/metareasoning.ts - Meta-reasoning logic with strategy evaluation algorithms, mode switching recommendations, quality assessment heuristics
Update src/services/ThoughtFactory.ts - Add metareasoning case to create MetaReasoningThought instances
Create src/services/MetaMonitor.ts - Session monitoring service to track mode usage patterns, evaluate reasoning effectiveness, suggest improvements
Run typecheck - verify no TypeScript errors
Create tests/unit/metareasoning.test.ts - Basic unit tests for meta-reasoning thought creation and validation
Run full test suite - verify all 740+ tests pass with new meta-reasoning mode

successCriteria: Meta-reasoning type system complete with all required fields
Tool routing configured for meta-reasoning mode
MetaMonitor service can track and evaluate sessions
Can monitor and evaluate reasoning strategies
notes: This sprint establishes the foundational infrastructure for meta-reasoning. Focus on creating a robust type system and core monitoring capabilities. The MetaMonitor service is key - it should be able to track session history and evaluate strategy effectiveness.
